docs.lead_paragraph: This play from Melissa Ross centers on three sisters with romantic challenges and other issues.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Of Good Stock,’ Alicia Silverstone Is a Sister in Distress

docs.abstract: Ben Brantley reviews Manhattan Theater Club production of Melissa Ross play Of Good Stock, directed by Lynne Meadow at City Center Stage I and starring Alicia Silverstone and Heather Lind.
docs.snippet: This play from Melissa Ross centers on three sisters with romantic challenges and other issues.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Maryland farmer charged with 20 counts of animal cruelty testified Wednesday that he treated his cattle, goats and sheep better than authorities did when they seized the livestock he allegedly neglected.

headline.main: Maryland Farmer Testifies at Trial, Denies Abusing Livestock
headline.print_headline: Maryland Farmer Testifies at Trial, Denies Abusing Livestock

docs.snippet: A Maryland farmer charged with 20 counts of animal cruelty testified Wednesday that he treated his cattle, goats and sheep better than authorities did when they seized the livestock he allegedly neglected.

docs.lead_paragraph: British songwriter Emily Portman draws on folklore, fairy tales and mythology to craft haunting, ethereal songs that weave the otherworldly with the everyday.

headline.main: Songwriter Emily Portman on Folk Tales and Motherhood
headline.print_headline: Songwriter Emily Portman on Folk Tales and Motherhood

docs.snippet: British songwriter Emily Portman draws on folklore, fairy tales and mythology to craft haunting, ethereal songs that weave the otherworldly with the everyday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The abuses inflicted on women around the world as their babies are born are forcing some to stay at home instead of going to a hospital.

headline.main: Report Shows Widespread Mistreatment by Health Workers During Childbirth
headline.print_headline: Abusive Treatment in Childbirth Is Detailed

docs.abstract: Report published in PLoS Medicine finds widespread mistreatment of women during childbirth across globe, including physical abuse and abysmal medical care; report suggests that abuse can drive women away from hospital and undermine international goals for reducing childbirth mortality.
docs.snippet: The abuses inflicted on women around the world as their babies are born are forcing some to stay at home instead of going to a hospital.
